theorem.name: exp_def_inductive

text.english: Definition of a number to the power of a positive number: \[ \forall n,m \in \mathbb{N} . \; m ^ {n+1} = m^n * m \]
text.italiano: Definizione di un numero elevato ad un numero positivo: \[ \forall n,m \in \mathbb{N} . \; m ^ {n+1} = m^n * m \]

theorem.coq:
Theorem exp_def_inductive: forall n m : nat, m ^ (n+1) = (m ^ n) * m.
Proof.
intros ; rewrite N.add_1_r ; rewrite N.pow_succ_r' ; rewrite N.mul_comm ; reflexivity.
Qed.
